alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Dooly, southeastern Sumter and northwestern Crisp Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Scrutchins, or 11 miles south of Americus, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Americus, Leslie, De Soto, Desoto, Cobb, Sumter, Lamar, Fort Early, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Maddox, and Huntington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
